scripts.test: npm run cordovalib-test && npm run create-project-unicode-space-in-path
scripts.cordovalib-test: killall 'iOS Simulator' && xcodebuild test -scheme CordovaLibTests -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5'
scripts.create-project-unicode-space-in-path: rm -rf "testcreate 応用"; ../bin/create "testcreate 応用" com.test.app 応用 && "./testcreate 応用/cordova/build" && rm -rf "testcreate 応用"
